programme.desc: Reza, MJ, Mike, Lilly, Asa and GG discuss the season with Andy Cohen.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset

programme.desc: A guest makes controversial comments at the retreat in Malibu, Calif., sparking a heated argument.; Reza names MJ as his maid of honor; Reza's fiancé's parents visit for the first time, laying bare an old family wound.

programme.desc: Mike separates himself from the group; MJ enlists the help of Reza to prepare her boyfriend for a surprise brunch with her mother; Asifa and Bobby finally move in together; Mike pops the question to his longtime girlfriend, Jessica.

programme.desc: Reality sets in for Reza as he faces the truth about marrying Adam; GG enlists MJ's help to get back into the dating scene; Asa nears a breaking point; everyone agrees to a game of dodgeball to relieve tension.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: Despite growing reservations about his relationship with Adam, Reza goes on a diet in anticipation of his upcoming nuptials; Mike dives into wedding planning while trying to reconnect with Reza; GG takes a polygraph test; MJ suffers a loss.

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Asa creates an art piece involving a flash mob with veiled performers; GG takes a second polygraph test with surprising results; Mike tries to make peace over dinner, then Jessica unleashes a martini-fueled tirade against the crew.

programme.sub-title: One Wedding and a Dog Funeral

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset

programme.sub-title: Lions and Buddhists and Persians, Oh My!

programme.title: Shahs of Sunset
